title: Boku No Watashi No Yusha Gaku

status: ぼくのわたしの勇者学 ; 吾等的勇者学 ; Boku no Watashi no Yushagaku ; Our Hero Lessons ; Our Hero Studies
description:
Description :
        It opens when a mysterious strangely dressed person who the kids mistake as a new transfer student enters a peaceful classroom. Much to their surprise he is their new homeroom teacher, among other things…

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2 : Ibaraki Muchiko "the Only Sound In The Room Is My Psp"
